estSg_S0: calculation of daily solar radiation from relative sunshine

estSg_S0.Rd

estSg_S0: calculation of daily solar radiation from relative sunshine

Usage

estSg_S0(RelSun, Month)

Arguments

RelSun

Relative sunshine duration of a particular day of year

Month

Month of the year

Value

solar radiation per day [MJ/m2/d]

Details

function for calculation of daily solar radiation from relative sunshine hours #### the function uses an empirical model calibrated from DWD data "mod.Angstroem"

On this page
